posts.post_content:
Posted By: Anthony S.
One of the T206 set's Big 4.

As you can see, a very nice portrait marred only by two white spots (one along the left eyebrow and one along the left ear).  I've looked at these spots under magnification and can't determine whether those white spots are paper loss or simply white spots.  There is also a tiny crease in the uppermost right corner, perhaps 1/4th of an inch long.

The card's back earned it its grade.  As you can see there is an area of paper loss, about the size of a quarter.

I'm only selling the card, the cuff link stays with me. --- SOLD

Anthony Stephenson
boboinnes33@gmail.com
